challenges.title: Coastal Weather Vulnerability
challenges.description: Boynton's proximity to the Gulf Stream means intense seasonal weather. We prioritize whole-home surge protection and robust backup power solutions for coastal residents.

challenges.description: Mature neighborhoods require expert electrical auditing to ensure aging panels and wiring can safely handle modern technology loads and high-efficiency HVAC.

challenges.description: With its active marina and waterfront properties, Boynton requires specialized dock wiring and boat lift power that meets strict marine safety standards.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Boynton Beach?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Boynton Beach including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Boynton Beach neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Boynton Beach?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Palm Beach County permits for electrical work in Boynton Beach, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Boynton Beach home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Boynton Beach homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Boynton Beach.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Boynton Beach?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Boynton Beach neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you provide emergency repairs for Boynton Beach residences?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 emergency electrical service to all Boynton Beach neighborhoods, ensuring your power is restored quickly and safely.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Boynton Beach?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We are fully licensed (FL License #EC13012419) and insured, with years of experience serving the Palm Beach County community.

seoContent.heading: Trusted Boynton Beach Electricians Since 2003
seoContent.body: Boynton Beach is a city of incredible natural beauty and growing opportunity. Known as the 'Gateway to the Gulf Stream,' it's a community that values its coastal heritage and its future progress. Solomon Electric is proud to provide the safe and reliable electrical foundation Boynton families and businesses need to thrive.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Boynton Beach's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Boynton Beach homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Palm Beach County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Boynton Beach's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Boynton Beach Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Boynton Beach. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Excellence in Electrical Care for Your Boynton Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're finishing a remodel in Canyon Lakes, needing dock power near the marina, or requiring an urgent repair in Aberdeen, our licensed team is here for you. We provide upfront pricing, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that has made us a local leader for over 15 years.
